text: Fusolatirus kandai is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Description== ==Distribution== ==References== * Snyder M.A. & Bouchet P. (2006) New species and new records of deep-water Fusolatirus (Neogastropoda: Fasciolariidae) from the West Pacific. Journal of Conchology 39(1): 1–12. Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1950
title: Fusolatirus kandai
